title: Hell Hazers II: The Reckoning
description: They sent the ghosts and demons back to hell, but they’re back again to settle the score… …again.
quote: These bastards aren’t taking us. Not without a fight.
altHero: a young brunette screams into the camera
alt1: the young brunette shines a flashlight in a creepy abandoned cabin
alt2: a knife covered in dripping blood
alt3: a teen boy holds an axe while peeking out a window
